How to use the Hello Package:

-   Overview: This package contains the function hello. This function allows for the user to input a name. A greeting "Hello, (name entered)" will then be pasted to the screen.

-   Installation: the command to install the package is: devtools::install_github('BIFX545-25/hello-r-AAzhar48'

-   Examples:

```{r}
library(devtools)
install_github('BIFX545-25/hello-r-AAzhar48')
```

```{r}
library(hello)
hello(Mr. Anderson)
```
